item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 28th March
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLEASE BRING X4 1 METER BARRIERS OUT AN X4 SANDBAGS AND PLACE AROUND DAMAGED CATV COVER TO MAKE SAFE. section 81 raised today 28/03/25 (Damaged Street Furniture)

item.title: Overhanging tree outside 1 Alstone Avenue, 28th March
item.description:
Tree on pavement is getting too large and needs cutting back, it is blocking out almost all light when leaves are out and branches are overhanging property blocking gutters.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Alstone Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath blocked by electric fence, 28th March
item.description:
Where footpath leaves corner of field. The footpath is also blocked by a different electric fence SW of this position (already reported by another user).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Andoversford, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
